General.Name: Stitch Fix
General.Description: Stitch Fix, Inc., sells a range of apparel, shoes, and accessories for women's, petite, maternity, men's, plus, and kids through its website and mobile application in the United States. It offers denim, dresses, blouses, skirts, shoes, jewelry, and handbags under the Stitch Fix brand. The company was formerly known as rack habit inc. and changed its name to Stitch Fix, Inc. in October 2011. Stitch Fix, Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 1 Montgomery Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94104
